articles.title: OnePlus 16 leak reveals sub-1 mm display bezels - Notebookcheck
articles.description: The next-generation OnePlus flagship, expected to be called the OnePlus 16, has appeared in a fresh leak. It suggests the device could feature even thinner bezels than the OnePlus 15.

articles.title: The Galaxy S26 series may already be behind Pixel phones in one big way - Android Authority
articles.description: Logs posted by a Google employee confirm the Galaxy S26 Ultra does not support powered-off tracking via Google's Find Hub.
